SCRATCH MADE GOODNESS.
SCRATCH MADE GOODNESS. SCRATCH MADE GOODNESS. Learn more 
Treat yourself in the New Year with our Cookies & Cream Milkshake!

Hand-spun with pieces of Oreo® cookies and layered with even more on top, its the perfect way to keep the post holiday blues away.
Order Now WELCOME TO HUGH-BABY’S Hugh-Baby’s brings people together from all over to enjoy some of life’s simplest pleasures. We take great care in preparing signature items that are scratch-made, cooked to order, and speak to our mid-South roots. We’re all about celebrating the classics, delivering value, and throwing back to the beloved local barbecue andburger spots of our youth. ORDER ONLINE Y’ALL COME VISIT Visit Hugh-Baby’s in Nashville, TN, or Charleston, SC. Open Daily 11AM - 9PM Charlotte Ave. Nashville 4816 Charlotte Avenue,Nashville, TN 37209 Order Online Learn More Order Catering Hunters Station EAST Nashville 975 Main Street,Nashville, TN 37206 Order Online Learn More Order Catering BERRY HILLNashville 718 Thompson Lane,Nashville, TN 37204 Order Online Learn More Order Catering CharlestonSouth Carolina 1028 St. Andrews Blvd,Charleston, SC 29407 Order Online Learn More Order Catering 
Made from scratch, Daily
Hugh-Baby’s burgers feature a proprietary blend of premium beef, ground fresh daily. Our slow-smoked Pulled Pork, Turkey, and Bologna follow the time-honored traditions of Memphis barbecue, and we smoke all the meat for our BBQ Sandwiches in-house every single day. Crispy, golden French Fries, gas station-style Hot Dogs, a killer house-made Veggie Burger, the Depression-era “Slugburger” (made famous in Corinth, Mississippi!), and hand-spun Milkshakes round out our intentionally small, straightforward menu. Our Menu 
FOLLOW HUGH-BABY’S ON INSTAGRAM
FOLLOW US

0 Dine-In, PICK UP, and Delivery All Of Our Locations Offer Enjoy from anywhere you’d like! Warm, genuine Southern hospitality is at the heart of what we do. We welcome you to enjoy our food in our dining rooms, patios, or in the comfort of your own home. We offer multiple ways to order: at the Counter, Drive-Thru, Walk-Up Windows, Online, and via Delivery Partners. We hope to see you soon! Open Daily 11AM - 9PM

0 OUR MENU BURGERS 
Hugh-Baby’s burgers feature a custom blend of premium beef.Ground fresh daily & cooked to order.+
Add bacon or sliced cheese to any burger+Add an extra patty*Heirloom tomatoes only available while in season. CHEESEBURGER 
Beef Patty, American Cheese, Pickles, Lettuce, Onion, Heirloom Tomato, Comeback Sauce
DOUBLE CHEESEBURGER 
Double Beef Patty, Double American Cheese, Pickles, Lettuce, Onion, Heirloom Tomato, Comeback Sauce
BBQ BURGER 
Beef Patty, American Cheese, Slow-Smoked Pulled Pork, Grilled Onions, Hugh-Baby’s BBQ Sauce
SHROOM & SWISS BURGER 
Swiss Cheese, Smoked Mushrooms, Yellow Mustard, Mayo
VEGGIE BURGER* 
Housemade Veggie Patty with Smoked Black Beans, Mushrooms, & Cashews Patty, Swiss Cheese, Pickles, Lettuce, Onion, Heirloom Tomato, Comeback Sauce
*Contains eggs & nuts! THE WORLD FAMOUS SLUGBURGER 
Made famous in Corinth, MS! Deep-Fried Ground Pork & Soy Meal, Pickles, Chopped Onions, Yellow Mustard
Only available on Fridays! BBQ 
We follow the time-honored traditions of slow-smokingour pulled pork, turkey, and bologna over hickory coals every single day.

BOTTLED WATER Our menu is subject to change. Please alert our team to any allergies. View our Allergy Menu here . Our kitchen uses peanuts, tree nuts, soy, milk, eggs and wheat. While we take steps to minimize ingredient crossover, we're unable to guarantee our entire menu is safe for people with these allergies. Thank you!
